mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Stanley, J. G. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Stanley, J. G.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Sept 14 1861. By Telegraph from Camp Scott 1861. It is understood by Genl Rosecrans that Genl Meigs has provided you & placed in your charge a quantity of clothing camp & infantry equipage for ten infantry & one Cavalry regt if so please answer me at once J. G. Stanley Capt AQM 39D83pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Stanley, J. G.
Camp Scott
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
